check.name: LineageStatementPresent
check.description: Checks to see if at least one Lineage Statement concept exists.
check.code:
def call(): global output global status
output = "The concept LineageStatement is present."
if(LineageStatement is not None and len(LineageStatement) > 0): status = "SUCCESS" return True
status = "FAILURE" output = "LineageStatement concept is not present"
return False
